User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user within the SyllabiQ platform.

uid.description: Unique identifier for the User entity.

role.description: Role of the user, one of 'student', 'teacher', or 'admin'.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was created.

lastLogin.description: Timestamp indicating the user's last login.

isActive.description: Indicates if the user account is active.

Meeting.title: Meeting
Meeting.description: Represents a meeting session within the SyllabiQ platform.

meetingCode.description: Unique human-readable code for the meeting.

meetingRoomId.description: Unique identifier for the meeting room (UUID).

hostUid.description: Reference to the User who is hosting the meeting.

isActive.description: Indicates whether the meeting is currently active.

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the meeting was created.

Participant.title: Participant
Participant.description: Represents a participant in a meeting.

uid.description: Reference to the User participating in the meeting.

role.description: Role of the participant (teacher or student).

joinedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the participant joined.

cameraOn.description: Indicates if the camera is on.

micOn.description: Indicates if the mic is on.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including their role.

params.name: uid
params.description: The unique identifier of the user.

definition.description: Stores meeting metadata, linking a human-readable code to a unique room ID.

params.name: meetingRoomId
params.description: The unique identifier for the meeting room (UUID).
